org.snakeskin.dsl

Class MutableStateBuilder

  • StateBuilder
    • org.snakeskin.dsl.MutableStateBuilder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Builder<T>

    public class MutableStateBuilder
extends StateBuilder

    Adds functionality to the StateBuilder, with certain special functions that can't be used in default or disabled states

    • Method Detail

      • rejectIf

        public void rejectIf(kotlin.jvm.functions.Function0<java.lang.Boolean> condition)

        Adds rejection conditions for this state.

        Parameters:
        condition - The function to run to check the conditions. Should return true if the state change should be rejected

      • timeout

        public void timeout(long timeout,
                    java.lang.Object timeoutTo)

        Sets up the timeout for this state

        Parameters:
        timeout - The time, in ms, to wait for the timeout
        timeoutTo - The name of the state to timeout to
